name: 數位信號處理
description:
To introduce the basic concepts and techniques of digital signal processing. Topics of interests include the discrete Fourier transform and digital filter design and applications.

本課程介紹數位訊號處理的基本概念和技術。探討主題包括離散傅立葉轉換(discrete Fourier transform)與數位濾波器的設計和應用
goals: 了解數位信號處理基本數學理論
能分析數位濾波器之數據
syllabus:
1.     Sinusoids

2.     Spectrum Representation

3.     Sampling and Aliasing

4.     FIR Filters

5.     Frequency Response of FIR Filters

6.     Discrete Fourier Transform

6.     Z-Transforms

7.     IIR Filters (自主學習)

methodologies.note: 講述 Digital Signal Processing重要概念與理論

grading.note: 約4-5份作業，包含Matlab 程式寫作
